title: Is it really important for HR department to use Technology? - Quora

HR Department is supposed to be interacting with people all the time to understand the emotions and help them use their capabilities for Self and Organisational Development. We noticed that many of the HR professionals are very very busy in day-to-day operations and do not have time for actual work. There is more than 80% of the time is consumed by the operational issues. If HR Department has to be relevant to Business and its people its important to focus on elimating operational aspects using Technology. Technology can play a great role in minimizing the time in operations and maximising efforts on People related interactions. HR Cloud is important to take care of HR Records, Employee Leave Management, Payroll Management, Employee Self Service, Mobile based HR application for employee and manager to operate.
